children.tooltip: Authorize the app here to start seeing some data

children.text:
Click on the music icon above to populate data by signing into your Spotify account

Remove '/edit' from the URL on the icon widget's trigger field and on requestToken's body param 'redirect_url' if you want to see data on deployed app
Hey {{appsmith.user.name}}! Let's customize your playlist for your location

children.placeholderText: or the name of a track

layoutOnLoadActions.name: _onPageActions.authorizeSpotifyUsage
